heroTitle: Buy Chicks. Rear Them. Sell Back. Make Profit.
heroSubtitle: We help you start your chicken business without stress. We sell you quality chicks and buy them back when they are big.
step1Desc: Select your birds and quantity on our website. It's very fast.
step2Desc: Pay a small booking fee to secure your spot in the queue.
step3Desc: We confirm your payment within a few minutes.
step4Desc: Our manager will call you within 5 minutes to discuss pick-up.
step5Desc: Go to the nearest agent in your town to collect your chicks.
sellToUsDesc: Many farmers grow chickens but struggle to find buyers. We solve that problem for you! We buy mature birds at a very good price and sell them to hotels, restaurants, and big customers.
whySellToUs: We understand the hard work of rearing birds. That is why we pay a fair price that gives you profit.
challengesSubtitle: We know the problems, and we have the solutions.
solFeed: We sell high-quality feed that makes birds grow fast.
solSickness: We guide you on how to keep your birds healthy.
solMarket: We buy back your mature birds at a great price.
solTools: We sell the best drinkers and feeders (tools).
solCare: We give you expert advice to avoid losing birds.
agentProgramDesc: Anyone can become an AFDEC agent. Once we verify you, you can start earning money easily by helping others get their chicks.
earnPerChick: Earn ₦50 to ₦100 for every single chick sold through you!
trustDesc: Your booking fee is safe and secures your spot. We confirm fast, we call you quickly, and our process is 100% transparent. No stress, no stories.
footerSlogan: Helping Nigerians earn more through poultry.
importantBusinessNoticeDesc: The booking fee is non-refundable and ensures only serious farmers get allocation.
inactiveProductsDesc: This product will not be visible to customers.
noProductsFoundDesc: Start by adding a new product or seeding demo data.
checkStatusDesc: Search using your Phone, Name, or Booking ID.
confirmationDesc: Our manager will call you at {phone} within 5 minutes to confirm everything.
bookingStep1Subtitle: Select the type of chicken you want to book.
bookingStep2Subtitle: Select the quantity of birds you need.
bookingStep3Subtitle: Make sure your phone number is correct. We will call you.
phoneNumberDesc: The manager will call this number.
importantHowItWorksDesc: After you pay the fee, we will call you on {phone} to confirm your pick-up date and location.
